member.name: CHARSETINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a character set.

member.name: CHARSETINFO.ciACP
member.summary: Windows ANSI code page identifier. For a list of identifiers, see Code Page Identifiers.

member.name: CHARSETINFO.fs
member.summary: A structure that identifies the Unicode subrange and the specific Windows ANSI character set/code page. Only one code page will be set when this structure is set by the function.
